Title: Establishes a commission to produce protocols on how to make schools in New York safer from school shootings and bombers; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes the make our schools safer commission to produce protocols on how to make schools in New York safer from school shootings and bombers; requires the commission to deliver a report of its findings to the legislature and the governor; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish the "make our schools safer" commission to produce protocols on how to make schools in New York safer from school shootings and bombers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
